item.title: 丹麦央行行长认为俄罗斯黑客是贷款人面临的主要风险
item.description: 丹麦中央银行的一位高级官员说，针对北欧银行的网络攻击对该地区的金融稳定构成了最大的威胁，这些攻击很可能是由与俄罗斯有联系的黑客所为。【原文：Cyber attacks against Nordic banks, likely perpetrated by Russia-linked hackers, pose the biggest threat to financial stability in the region, a top Danish central bank official said.】

item.title: 印度监察机构调查阿达尼公司是否违反信息披露规定
item.description: 据知情人士透露，印度资本市场监管部门正在调查阿达尼集团是否违反了披露市场动态信息的规定。【原文：India’s capital markets regulator is looking into whether the Adani Group violated rules mandating the disclosure of market-moving information, according to people with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: MUFG 因员工盗走客户保险箱中的 1300 万美元而解雇员工
item.description: 三菱日联金融集团（Mitsubishi UFJ Financial Group Inc.【原文：Mitsubishi UFJ Financial Group Inc. said it has fired an employee who allegedly stole as much as ¥2 billion ($13 million) from the safe deposit boxes of approximately 60 customers.】

item.title: 据说 Greatview 董事长考虑与 Cloudview 进行反竞标
item.description: 知情人士透露，Greatview Aseptic Packaging Co. 的董事长正在与中国私募股权公司云锋基金（Cloudview Capital）商谈合作收购这家乳制品包装公司的事宜，这可能会引发一场竞购战。【原文：Greatview Aseptic Packaging Co.’s chairman is in talks with Chinese private equity firm Cloudview Capital about teaming up on a buyout offer for the dairy packaging company, people familiar with the matter said, potentially kicking off a bidding war.】

item.title: 英国零售销售降幅超预期，预算前焦虑情绪弥漫
item.description: 由于消费者在工党政府的首份预算案出台前缩减了开支，英国 10 月份的零售额降幅超过了预期。【原文：UK retail sales fell more than expected in October as consumers held back on spending ahead of the Labour government’s first budget.】

item.title: 美国证券交易委员会盯上的加密代币因根斯勒计划退出而跳水
item.description: 被美国证券交易委员会标记为未注册证券的数字资产在该机构主席加里-根斯勒（Gary Gensler）宣布计划下台后反弹。【原文：Digital assets flagged as unregistered securities by the US Securities and Exchange Commission are rallying after the agency’s Chair Gary Gensler, the industry’s bete noire, announced that he plans to step down.】

item.title: 德国经济增长下调，出口下滑拖累经济
item.description: 德国第三季度的经济增长低于最初的报告，这是在德国即将提前举行大选之际的又一个坏消息。【原文：Germany’s economy expanded less than initially reported in the third quarter, another piece of bad news as the country heads for early elections.】

item.title: 英国能源账单将上涨，表明通胀风险持续存在
item.description: 英国能源价格上限将在 1 月份上调，这预示着该措施对通胀的影响将持续下去。【原文：The UK energy price cap will rise in January, a signal that the inflationary impact the measure is having is set to continue.】

item.title: 科技股盈利疲软打击市场情绪，中国股市暴跌
item.description: 周五下午，由于对唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）即将复出的担忧，已经疲软的市场情绪受到令人失望的科技股收益的打击，中国股市的跌势进一步加深。【原文：A selloff in Chinese stocks deepened on Friday afternoon, as disappointing tech earnings hit sentiment already weakened by concerns over Donald Trump’s imminent return.】

item.title: 贝恩支持的 Kioxia 确定 12 月东京首次公开募股价格
item.description: 贝恩资本（Bain Capital）支持的 Kioxia Holdings Corp. 将首次公开募股（IPO）的指示性价格定为每股 1,390 日元，这是 Kioxia Holdings Corp. 利用日本股市复苏机会的最新尝试。【原文：Bain Capital-backed Kioxia Holdings Corp. is setting its indicative IPO price at ¥1,390 per share, the latest attempt to capitalize on Japan’s stock market renewal.】

item.title: 富时 100 指数直播：零售销售数据公布前，英镑创五月份以来新低
日本发电量降至十多年来最低水平
item.description: 在截至 3 月份的一年中，日本的总发电量降至十多年来的最低点，低于科维德-19 大流行时期的水平。【原文：Japan’s total power generation fell to the lowest in more than a decade in the year through March, dropping below levels seen during the Covid-19 pandemic.】

item.title: 博雅银行印度分行三名银行家在股票发行调查中离职
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，美国银行（Bank of America Corp.【原文：Three dealmakers from Bank of America Corp. in India have left the company amid an internal investigation on allegations of wrongdoing involving stock offerings, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: PE 公司 Harith 以 3.6 亿美元收购非洲基础设施基金
item.description: 以南非私募股权公司 Harith General Partners 为首的一批投资者同意以 65 亿兰特（3.6 亿美元）的价格收购一家基础设施基金，该基金持有的资产包括兰塞里亚国际机场和开尔文电站。【原文：A group of investors led by South African private equity firm Harith General Partners agreed to buy out an infrastructure fund with stakes in assets including Lanseria International Airport and Kelvin Power Station for 6.5 billion rand ($360 million).】

item.title: 国防资金是波兰国家开发银行的新优先事项
item.description: 在邻国乌克兰战事不断升级的情况下，波兰正在增加军费开支，因此波兰的开发银行正将优先事项转向为国防开支提供资金。【原文：Poland’s development bank is switching priorities to bankrolling defense spending as the country ramps up military outlays amid an escalating war in neighboring Ukraine.】

item.title: 印度 11 月 PMI 指数显示经济活动变化不大
item.description: 早期调查显示，11 月份印度经济活动变化不大，服务业略有回升，而制造业有所放缓。【原文：India’s economic activity was little changed in November as services picked up slightly while manufacturing moderated, early surveys showed.】

item.title: NTPC 绿色能源公司 12 亿美元首次公开募股最后一天全部售罄
item.description: 印度最大的电力生产商 NTPC 有限公司的可再生能源部门首次发行的 12 亿美元股票在销售的最后一天全部售罄，因为投资者争先恐后地想进入这个迅速扩张的行业。【原文：The $1.2 billion initial share offering of the renewable-energy arm of top Indian power producer NTPC Ltd. was fully sold on the last day of its sale as investors clamor for exposure to the rapidly expanding sector.】

item.title: CreditSights 称，阿达尼绿色贷款是近期最大的隐忧
item.description: 据研究公司 CreditSights 称，阿达尼集团的创始人高塔姆-阿达尼（Gautam Adani）被美国检察官起诉后，该集团绿色能源业务的再融资成为近期最大的关注点。【原文：Refinancing for Adani Group’s green energy business is the biggest concern in the near term after the indictment of the conglomerate’s founder Gautam Adani by US prosecutors, according to research firm CreditSights.】

item.title: 橡树在澳大利亚咨询公司收购案中寻求私人信用贷款
item.description: 据知情人士透露，橡树资本管理公司（Oaktree Capital Management LP）正在敲定一笔私人信用贷款，以支持其收购澳大利亚咨询公司 AZ Next Generation Advisory 的股份。【原文：Oaktree Capital Management LP is finalizing a private credit loan to back its acquisition of a stake in Australian advisory firm AZ Next Generation Advisory, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 受阿达尼投资影响，GQG 计划回购股票
item.description: 美国投资公司 GQG Partners Inc. 是阿达尼集团的主要投资者之一，该公司表示正计划回购其在澳大利亚上市的股票，此前该股周四因担心其在印度企业集团旗下公司的投资而暴跌。【原文：GQG Partners Inc., a US investment firm that’s one of Adani Group’s key investors, said it’s planning to buy back its Australia-listed shares, after the stock tumbled Thursday on concerns about its investments in the Indian conglomerate’s units.】

item.title: 在中国发现可观资源后，湖南黄金股价大涨
item.description: 在中国中部湖南省发现大量黄金资源后，湖南黄金集团股份有限公司（Hunan Gold Corp.【原文：Hunan Gold Corp. have surged by their 10% limit for two days in a row after a sizable gold resource was discovered in central China’s Hunan province.】

item.title: 从长远来看，我们都是修订版预测
item.description:
一年一度的发布下一年度预测并将其拆解的仪式正在进行中。然后是长期预测。【原文：

The annual ritual of publishing next-year forecasts and then tearing them apart is underway. And then there’s the long term.

】

item.title: 如何让英国再次繁荣
item.description:
经济学家萨姆-鲍曼（Sam Bowman）做客《Merryn Talks Money》节目，解释英国经济停滞不前的原因，以及英国如何才能启动经济增长。【原文：

Economist Sam Bowman joins Merryn Talks Money to explain why the UK has stagnated and what it can do to kickstart growth.

】

item.title: 迫在眉睫的金融困境为罗马尼亚大选蒙上阴影
item.description:
在经历了国家经济的黄金时代之后，增税和削减开支的前景成为竞选活动的主要议题。【原文：

After a golden era for the country’s economy, the prospect of tax increases and spending cuts is dominating the campaign.

】

item.title: 受能源制裁影响，俄罗斯大型液化天然气建设设施灯光暗淡
item.description: 俄罗斯唯一的液化天然气模块建造场的活动似乎有所下滑，这再次表明西方的制裁正在挫败俄罗斯在这一关键能源市场上崭露头角的雄心。【原文：Activity appears to have slumped at Russia’s only construction yard for liquefied natural gas modules, another sign of how Western sanctions are thwarting the country’s ambition to become a top player in this key energy market.】

item.title: 汽油价格飙升后，尼日利亚人开始将汽车改用压缩天然气
item.description: 在尼日利亚各地的加油站，汽车大排长龙是常见的景象，但对于一些转向使用压缩天然气的司机来说，加油泵正在成为过去。【原文：Long queues of cars are a common sight at petrol stations across Nigeria, but for some drivers turning to compressed natural gas, pumps are becoming a thing of the past.】

item.title: 菲律宾中央银行称美元走强导致菲律宾比索疲软
item.description: 在菲律宾比索跌至历史最低点一天后，菲律宾中央银行表示，菲律宾比索的疲软是由美元走强造成的。【原文：The weakness in the Philippine peso is caused by a strong dollar, the central bank said, a day after the local currency fell to a record low.】

item.title: 乐天化学债权人会议聚焦韩国风险
item.description: 乐天化学（Lotte Chemical）出人意料地召开债权人会议，以取消其债券契约中的一项条款，这使投资者对韩国利率敏感行业所面临的风险更加关注。【原文：Lotte Chemical’s surprise move to call a creditors meeting to remove a clause in its bonds covenant is bringing into sharp focus the risks investors face from exposure to interest rates sensitive industries in South Korea.】

item.title: 欧洲基准价格上涨，亚洲液化天然气跃升至今年最高点
item.description: 由于来自欧洲的供暖和发电厂燃料竞争加剧，北亚现货液化天然气价格跃升至今年最高水平。【原文：North Asia spot liquefied natural gas prices jumped to the highest level this year on increased competition from Europe for the heating and power plant fuel.】

item.title: 西澳大利亚小麦收成意外丰收
item.description: 西澳大利亚州的小麦有望获得意外丰收，尽管本季早些时候的降雨量较低，预计会抑制产量。【原文：Western Australia is on track for a surprise bumper wheat crop, despite low rainfall earlier in the season that had been expected to crimp output.】
